isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - CATERPILLAR 3176B/3406E ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - 1994 - DESCRIPTION - ELECTRONIC SERVICE TOOLS

svcprocinfo.para: Electronic service tools are designed to help the service technician locate faults and/or analyze problems within the 3176B/3406E systems. Diagnostic code reading and switch monitoring can be done using the service tools. An electronic service tool is necessary to read or change operating parameters.

svcsubproc.title: Diagnostic Connector (220)
svcsubproc.para: International provides a Diagnostic connector (220) for connecting an Electronic Service Tool (EST) to the electronic engine control system. The Diagnostic connector is located on the instrument panel left.

svcsubproc.title: Caterpillar Service Tools
svcsubproc.para: Caterpillar service tools are available for 3176B/3406E engines. The Electronic Control Analyzer Programmer (ECAP) and the Digital Diagnostic Tool (DDT) both can communicate with 3176B/3406E engines. Refer to Caterpillar Service Manual for complete information needed to use these tools.

svcsubproc.title: MPSI Pro-Link 9000
svcsubproc.para: The MPSI Pro-Link 9000 Electronic Service Tool is available with a single cartridge that communicates with both the Caterpillar 3176B/3406E engines. The Pro-Link 9000 communicates with the engine ECM through the Diagnostic connector. A manual is provided with the MPSI Caterpillar cartridge explaining its use.

This section does not discuss engine diagnostics, except as they relate to International installed circuits or components. Refer to the Caterpillar Engine Operators Manual furnished with the vehicle and/or other Caterpillar Electronic Troubleshooting Manuals for additional engine related information.

note.para: When referring to an electronic service tool (EST), this manual will make reference to the MPSI Pro-Link.
